wikipedia_page.main: Sir Peter William Shelley Yorke Scarlett  (30 March 1905 – 28 December 1987) was a British diplomat who was ambassador to Norway and to the Holy See.

link_mentions.page: List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to the Holy See

response: The Duke of Leeds was buried in the Protestant Cemetery, Rome on 24 March 1964. Sir Peter Scarlett, British Minister to the Holy See, represented the Queen at the funeral, and the British Ambassador to Italy, Sir John Ward, represented the Queen Mother.

link_mentions.page: List of diplomats of the United Kingdom to Norway
